name: DigiGods
summary:
EARLY ACCESS IS HERE! 

CREATE, PLAY, & SHARE in a physics-based sandbox environment where you can shoot, parkour, or simulate any type of gameplay you desire, taking the best of VR goofiness.

Create intricate puzzles, a zero-gravity team shooter, or board games, the possibilities within DigiGods is limitless. Featuring little to no loading times, you can jump right into the action and start creating to you heart's content!

DigiGods will be free-to-play forever.
